Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

::Kaiser::
       He shrugs.  "I am not the one being tested here, but if you insist."  
He braces himself and begins his charge at DeathSteel.  His right arm holding 
one blade parallel to the ground and his left blade trailing behind him.  As 
he approaches he draws his right arm back slightly then slashes it across at 
DeathSteel's throat.  His trailing left blade comes in for a simultaneous 
thrust at DeathSteel's abdomen.

--part1_1d3.5fa9150.2bb30849_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
